channel.title: Research on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: Galaxy classification
item.description: I was awarded a NASA space grant through WSU to develop methods using Topological Data Analysis for classifying galaxies that have WR-bumps or not. Check out my blog post Classification using Persistence Images for a walk through on the methods I used.
